overview_description.description: Ampersand catalyzes and power mass-market electric mobility. By supplying the battery swap network and operating system the company makes sustainable mobility rapidly accessible and affordable for developing markets, to improve livelihoods and the environment. As of January 2024, 2000 Ampersand customers are covering 1.5 million km a week in Nairobi and Kigali.
